Description: Years from the start o the implementation of the intervention to the end.
label: Project time horizon

Description: Percentage risk that a natural hazard may occur.
label: Risk of natural hazard

Description: Percentage risk that a chosen intervention will be poorly managed.
label: Risk of bad maintenance

Description: Percentage risk that a chosen intervention will be poorly designed.
label: Risk of bad design

Description: Percentage risk that the communities surrounding the reservoir will not comply with requirements for intervention effectiveness.
label: Risk of non compliance

Description: Percentage risk that the communities surrounding the reservoir will not help with the implentation of the dredging intervention.
label: Risk pop non involv (dredg.)

Description: Percentage risk that the necessary donors (local and national goverments, local NGOs) will not help with the implentation of the dredging intervention.
label: Risk donors non involv (dredg.)

Description: Percentage risk that the communities surrounding the reservoir will not help with the implentation of the check dam intervention.
label: Risk pop non involv (check d.)

Description: Percentage risk that the necessary institutions (local and national goverments, local NGOs) will not help with the implentation of the check dam intervention.
label: Risk instit. non involv (check d.)

Description: Percentage risk that the necessary donors (local and national goverments, local NGOs) will not help with the implentation of the check dam intervention.
label: Risk donors non involv (check d.)

Description: Percentage risk that the communities surrounding the reservoir will not help with the implentation of the buffer strip intervention.
label: Risk pop non involv (buffer s.)

Description: Percentage risk that the necessary institutions (local and national goverments, local NGOs) will not help with the implentation of the buffer strip intervention.
label: Risk instit. non involv (buffer s.)

Description: Percentage risk that the necessary donors (local and national goverments, local NGOs) will not help with the implentation of the buffer strip intervention.
label: Risk donors non involv (buffer s.)

Description: The total current area (ha) of irrigattion downstream formal irrigation area (scheme 1)
label: current irrigated area D/S

Description: Tropical Livestock Units that are kept in the reservoir area and, at least partly, dependent on reservoir water
label: TLU (baseline)

Description: Percentage change (reduction or growth of population) in Tropical Livestock Units that are kept in the reservoir area if the buffer strips are implemented
label: TLU change if buffer s.

Description: Livestock keepers profit (USD) per Tropical Livestock Unit.
label: profit per TLU

Description: Coefficient of variation, ratio of the standard deviation to the mean (a measure of relative variability).
label: coeff. Variation

Description: The total t area (ha) of irrigattion downstream formal irrigation area (scheme 1) that would be lost if the pipes that provide water from the reservoir were clogged.
label: Irrigated area D/S lost if pipes clogged

Description: The costs (USD) of a necessary study to plan the dredging intervention.
label: Study cost (dredg.)

Description: The costs (USD) of necessary supervision to implement the dredging intervention.
label: Supervision costs (dredg.)

Description: The costs (USD) of necessary administrative costs for implementing the dredging intervention.
label: Admin. costs (dredg.)

Description: The costs (USD) of necessary transportation when implementing the dredging intervention.
label: Transport costs (dredg.)

Description: The costs (USD) of necessary communications (phones etc.) when implementing the dredging intervention.
label: Comm. costs (dredg.)
